title: Film technique: editing. Parts 1 and 2

description: Episode of Series "Film making techniques". Explains the editor's responsibilities and summarises the various stages of editing. The first part deals mainly with the editing of silent films. The second part is more complex and discusses the editing of film with sound and synchronising sound and picture. Intended for film and TV trainees and technical colleges.
